entry.title: Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object Deserialization
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object Deserialization

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-49113

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail在1.5.10之前和1.6.x在1.6.11之前的版本中，由于program/actions/settings/upload.php中的_from参数未经验证，导致PHP对象反序列化漏洞，允许认证用户远程执行代码。攻击者可以以Web服务器权限执行任意系统命令。

产品厂商： Roundcube

产品名称： Roundcube Webmail

影响版本： version <= 1.5.10 and 1.6.x <= 1.6.11

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/5725e6faf7b1399db5b21e6095c995e811996f60/modules%2Fexploits%2Fmulti%2Fhttp%2Froundcube_auth_rce_cve_2025_49113.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object

entry.title: Fortinet SSL-VPN 堆缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fortinet SSL-VPN 堆缓冲区溢出漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2022-42475

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fortinet SSL-VPN中存在一个堆缓冲区溢出漏洞（CWE-122），影响FortiOS（版本7.2.0至7.2.2、7.0.0至7.0.8、6.4.0至6.4.10、6.2.0至6.2.11、6.0.15及更早版本）和FortiProxy SSL-VPN（版本7.2.0至7.2.1、7.0.7及更早版本）。远程未认证攻击者可通过特制请求执行任意代码或命令。

产品厂商： fortinet

产品名称： fortios

影响版本： 7.2.0 <= version <= 7.2.2, 7.0.0 <= version <= 7.0.8, 6.4.0 <= version <= 6.4.10, 6.2.0 <= version <= 6.2.11, version <= 6.0.15

搜索语法： port:10443 http.favicon.hash:945408572, cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:fortinet:fortios”, http.html:”/remote/login” “xxxxxxxx”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/8dabb9389d1a48d35e6e37c5e7b913d5af2aef37/code%2Fcves%2F2022%2FCVE-2022-42475.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fortinet SSL-VPN 堆缓冲区溢出漏洞

entry.title: elFinder 命令注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： elFinder 命令注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-9194

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： elFinder在2.1.48版本之前存在一个命令注入漏洞。该漏洞发生在对JPEG文件执行图像操作时，文件名未经适当清理就被传递给exiftran实用程序，从而允许命令注入。

产品厂商： studio-42

产品名称： elFinder

影响版本： <= 2.1.47

搜索语法： http.title:”elfinder”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/a82dd708198aba7cc1638a7c902c787598b79392/http%2Fcves%2F2019%2FCVE-2019-9194.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： elFinder 命令注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

entry.title: elFinder Command Injection Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： elFinder Command Injection Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-9194

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： elFinder 2.1.48之前的版本中的PHP连接器存在命令注入漏洞，由于未对输入进行充分过滤，攻击者可以通过发送精心构造的请求来执行任意命令。

产品厂商： elFinder

产品名称： elFinder

影响版本： version < 2.1.48

搜索语法： http.title:”elfinder”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12288

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

elFinder before 2.1.48 contains a command injection caused by unsanitized input in the PHP connector, letting attackers execute arbitrary commands, exploit requires attacker to send crafted requests.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/46481/
  • https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/46539/
  • https://github.com/cved-sources/cve-2019-9194

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"elfinder"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： elFinder Command Injection Vulnerabilit

entry.title: Missing Authentication in the registration feature of Lablup's BackendAI allows arbitrary users
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-ww28-4m4v-cq4j

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接:

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-49652

  • https://hiddenlayer.com/sai_security_advisor/2025-05-backendai-49653

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-ww28-4m4v-cq4j

描述：

Missing Authentication in the registration feature of Lablup’s BackendAI allows arbitrary users to create user accounts that can access private data even when registration is disabled.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-ww28-4m4v-cq4j

entry.title: SAP Business Warehouse and SAP Plug-In Basis allows an authenticated attacker to drop arbitrary
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6m52-p2fg-w7xc

CVSS 评分： 8.5

参考链接:

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-42983

  • https://me.sap.com/notes/3606484

  • https://url.sap/sapsecuritypatchday

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6m52-p2fg-w7xc

描述：

SAP Business Warehouse and SAP Plug-In Basis allows an authenticated attacker to drop arbitrary SAP database tables, potentially resulting in a loss of data or rendering the system unusable. On successful exploitation, an attacker can completely delete database entries but is not able to read any data.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6m52-p2fg-w7xc

entry.title: SAP GRC allows a non-administrative user to access and initiate transaction which could allow
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7xgc-5jg8-2xhx

CVSS 评分： 8.8

参考链接:

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-42982

  • https://me.sap.com/notes/3609271

  • https://url.sap/sapsecuritypatchday

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7xgc-5jg8-2xhx

描述：

SAP GRC allows a non-administrative user to access and initiate transaction which could allow them to modify or control the transmitted system credentials. This causes high impact on confidentiality, integrity and availability of the application.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7xgc-5jg8-2xhx

entry.title: RFC inbound processing�does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user,
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-p85x-xv8x-v67q

CVSS 评分： 9.6

参考链接:

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-42989

  • https://me.sap.com/notes/3600840

  • https://url.sap/sapsecuritypatchday

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-p85x-xv8x-v67q

描述：

RFC inbound processing�does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges. On successful exploitation the attacker could critically impact both integrity and availability of the application.

entry.title: HTTP Protocol Stack 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： HTTP Protocol Stack 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2022-21907

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： HTTP Protocol Stack 中存在一个远程代码执行漏洞，该漏洞由于协议处理不当导致，允许远程攻击者在受影响的系统上执行任意代码。利用此漏洞需要网络访问受影响系统。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： HTTP Protocol Stack

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12263

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

原始信息

Description:

The HTTP Protocol Stack contains a remote code execution caused by a vulnerability in the protocol handling, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires network access to the affected system.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/kamal-marouane/CVE-2022-21907
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/8d7c3f5c3e4c
  • https///github.com:kamal-marouane/CVE-2022-21907.git
  • https://github.com/asepsaepdin/CVE-2022-21907

  • https://github.com/EzoomE/CVE-2022-21907-RCE
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/9e5b11d4061d
  • https///github.com:EzoomE/CVE-2022-21907-RCE.git
  • https://github.com/cassie0206/CVE-2022-21907
  • https://github.com/0xmaximus/Home-Demolisher
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/167adf17e68c
  • https///github.com:0xmaximus/Home-Demolisher.git
  • https://github.com/Malwareman007/CVE-2022-21907

  • https://github.com/iveresk/cve-2022-21907-http.sys
  • https://github.com/gpiechnik2/nmap-CVE-2022-21907
  • https://github.com/polakow/CVE-2022-21907
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/86fb978ad867
  • https///github.com:polakow/CVE-2022-21907.git
  • https://github.com/michelep/CVE-2022-21907-Vulnerability-PoC
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/8444bab2f56f
  • https///github.com:michelep/CVE-2022-21907-Vulnerability-PoC.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/837d27449c0a
  • https///gitlab.com:swarupsro/CVE-2022-21907.git
  • https://github.com/p0dalirius/CVE-2022-21907-http.sys
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/f31e1149e743
  • https///github.com:p0dalirius/CVE-2022-21907-http.sys.git
  • https://github.com/xiska62314/CVE-2022-21907
  • https://github.com/ZZ-SOCMAP/CVE-2022-21907
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/1306e5fc35fb
  • https///github.com:ZZ-SOCMAP/CVE-2022-21907.git
  • https://github.com/mauricelambert/CVE-2022-21907
  • https://github.com/corelight/cve-2022-21907

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: PrestaShop 'possearchproducts' SQL注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： PrestaShop ‘possearchproducts’ SQL注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-30192

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： 在PosThemes为PrestaShop开发的模块“Search Products”（possearchproducts）中，受影响版本的访客可以执行SQL注入攻击。成功利用此漏洞可能导致未经授权的访问、数据泄露以及PrestaShop应用及其底层数据库的潜在危害。

产品厂商： PosThemes

产品名称： Search Products (possearchproducts)

影响版本： <= 1.7

搜索语法： http.component:”prestashop”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/c611e9bf0ec12497ca2e0a23e49cd0a5d583884c/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-30192.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

原始信息

漏洞信息
